title: Guitar
description: playing guitar is one of my favourite pasttimes. playing metal music is my favourite, and I have been playing for around 10 years on and off. I have also gotten grade 5 with rockschool.

title: Reading
description: I also enjoy reading too. I often read C.S. Lewis books and Gamebooks, and various other non fiction genres.

title: Languages
description: I am currently learning russian from scratch, and am trying to improve my existing japanese.
